credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Robert Junkins' Garrison House, York, Maine
provenance: Gift of Mrs. Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Horizontal view of a dominant blocky frame house with a large brick chimney and overhanging second story perched on a hill at center background, a stone wall and attached board fence extending across the middle ground, and a boy and young woman holding hands and walking along path at lower left foreground.
name: Painting
